headline: Clorox to Present at Barclays Global Consumer Staples Conference
summary: The Clorox Company (NYSE: CLX) today announced that Chair and Chief Executive Officer Linda Rendle and Chief Financial Officer Luc Bellet will participate in a fireside chat at the Barclays Global Consumer Staples Conference on Wednesday, September 3, 2025, in Boston.

raw.summary: The Clorox Company (NYSE: CLX) today announced that Chair and Chief Executive Officer Linda Rendle and Chief Financial Officer Luc Bellet will participate in a fireside chat at the Barclays Global Consumer Staples Conference on Wednesday, September 3, 2025, in Boston.

headline: Clorox Stock: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish?
summary: Clorox has lagged the broader market over the past year, and analysts are cautious about its future outlook.
